summary: Diff adds a new Motoko backend actor plus a frontend app with Internet Identity gating, a multi-step team-building wizard, player search/filter UI, roster review with points, and references to generated static images. However, key backend behaviors (11-player enforcement, full data model methods) and the presence of the required image files cannot be confirmed from the truncated/omitted diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend exposes query methods to list available players and fetch a user’s teams; update methods to create a team and modify its roster; all stored records are associated with the authenticated principal.
missing_requirements.reason: backend/main.mo is truncated before team/player APIs are shown; the diff summary does not provide evidence that getAllPlayers / getUserTeams / roster modification methods exist and correctly scope all records by caller principal.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend rejects any roster updates that would result in a team having fewer than 11 or more than 11 players (with a clear error type/message).
missing_requirements.reason: Frontend shows UI gating (e.g., continue disabled unless 11 selected), but backend enforcement is not evidenced in the truncated backend/main.mo; no backend validation error type/message is visible in the provided diff excerpt.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generated images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated with the specified filenames and are referenced via static paths.
missing_requirements.reason: UI references the two image paths, but the diff summary does not show the actual image files being added because omitted files include some added files; thus existence under frontend/public/assets/generated cannot be confirmed from provided evidence.
evidence: File diff summary: "Omitted files due to limits: added=15"

hallucinated_features.description: User profile setup flow (name prompt) and profile storage APIs (get/save profile).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not ask for user profiles; only Internet Identity login and team management were required.
evidence: backend/main.mo (UserProfile type and profile methods shown)

hallucinated_features.description: Custom access control system with admin secret initialization via URL parameter (caffeineAdminToken) and role/permission checks.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only required Internet Identity authentication and per-principal scoping; it did not request an admin token, role system, or secret-based access-control initialization.
evidence: backend/main.mo (imports authorization/MixinAuthorization and AccessControl; permission checks)

hallucinated_features.description: Budget/currency constraints and cost limits for teams/players (TEAM_COST_LIMIT, PLAYER_COST_LIMIT) and balance deduction with "Insufficient funds" trap.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not require auction budget enforcement/cost caps; it only required base cost/value to exist in the data model.
evidence: backend/main.mo (TEAM_COST_LIMIT/PLAYER_COST_LIMIT, balance field, addPlayer balance deduction and trap)

hallucinated_features.description: Caffeine.ai promotional footer link with referral parameters.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in BuildRequest; adds unrelated branding.
